revision.text:
{{quote|A Defender whose skills shine even brighter in the face of adversity. A ray of hope on the field of battle.|Class menu description}} [[File:XC3 Guardian Commander Weapon Icon.png|thumb|180px|The Guardian Commander class icon]] '''Guardian Commander''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|ガーディアンコマンダー}}, ''Gādian komandā'') is a [[Keves]]i [[Defender (XC3)|Defender]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] in {{XC3}}.[https://twitter.com/XenobladeJP/status/1536243206710784001]. == Overview == Guardian Commanders specialize in protecting their allies. They fight with the [[Blade (XC3)|Gutsy Gladius]], a sword and shield. Their abilities are enhanced by adversity, making them reliable companions to stand up to strongest [[Enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. Guardian Commander is the Class of [[Zeon]]. It is unlocked after the [[Hero Quest]] ''[[Where The Heart Is]]'', and is upgraded with ''[[Reasons to Evolve]]''. {{clr}} == Class Aptitude and Unlock Requirements == {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%; valign:center;" !Party Member |[[File:Icon chara battle n0ah.png|60px]]
'''[[Noah]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 1.png|60px]]
'''[[Mio]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 2.png|60px]]
'''[[Eunie]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 3.png|60px]]
'''[[Taion]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 4.png|60px]]
'''[[Lanz]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 5.png|60px]]
'''[[Sena]]''' |- !Aptitude |[[File:XC3 Aptitude S Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude C Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude D Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude A Icon.png|35px]] |- !Class Unlock Points Required |''Class Inheritor'' |4,250 |5,100 |5,950 |3,400 |2,550 |} == Class Rank Requirements == {| class="xc1 centered" width="45%" ! Rank ! CP needed ! Nopon Coin Cost |- | 1 | colspan="2" | None |- | 2 | 220 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 3 | 220 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 4 | 270 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 5 | 270 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 6 | 325 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 7 | 325 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 8 | 355 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 9 | 355 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 10 | 380 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | colspan="3" class="event" | Complete ''[[Reasons to Evolve]]'' |- | 11 | 355 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 12 | 355 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 13 | 470 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 14 | 470 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 15 | 590 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 16 | 590 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 17 | 705 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 18 | 705 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 19 | 760 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 20 | 880 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |} {{clr}} == Class Stats == The Guardian Commander class grants the following multipliers to a character's base stats (see their individual pages for their base stats), and sets their Physical and Ether Defense to the following values, depending on their current Rank. Intermediate values are linearly interpolated between the minimum and maximum values, rounding to the nearest percent. {| class="xc1 centered" width="100%" ! Rank !! HP !! Attack !! Healing Power !! Dexterity !! Agility !! Physical Defense !! Ether Defense |- | 1 || 110% || 70% || 30% || 100% || 70% || 40% || 30% |- | 10 || 115% || 72% || 32% || 102% || 72% || 45% || 32% |- | 20 || 120% || 75% || 35% || 105% || 75% || 50% || 35% |} === Weapon Stats === The character's Attack stat after being modified by the above class stats is further modified by adding the class's weapon stat, which depends on the character's [[Level (XC3)|Level]], to obtain the final base Attack stat. These weapon stats also determine the character's Critical Rate and Block Rate. Characters temporarily assume these weapon stats to calculate relevant statistics when using a Master Art from this Class without it being part of a Fusion Art. If a Master Art is used in a Fusion Art, the weapon stats corresponding to the character's current Class will be used instead for calculations. {| class="xc1 centered" width="60%" ! Level !! Attack !! Critical Rate !! Block Rate |- | 1 || 16 || 4% || 30% |- | 10 || 36 || 4% || 31% |- | 20 || 65 || 5% || 32% |- | 30 || 100 || 5% || 33% |- | 40 || 140 || 6% || 34% |- | 50 || 187 || 6% || 35% |- | 60 || 239 || 6% || 36% |- | 70 || 296 || 7% || 37% |- | 80 || 361 || 7% || 38% |- | 90 || 434 || 8% || 39% |- | 99 || 508 || 8% || 40% |} == Arts == * '''[[Deflector Field]]''' ([[Battle Arts (XC3)|Talent Art]]) - Absorb damage/[[Awakening (XC3)|Awaken]] * [[Imperial Sword (XC3)|Imperial Sword]] - Awakened Boost * [[Shield Bash (XC3)|Shield Bash]] - [[Topple (XC3)|Topple]] (Rank 10 Master Art) * [[Falcon Swoop]] - AOE / Awakened Boost * [[Noble Taunt]] - Taunt (Rank 1 Master Art) * [[Grand Protection]] - Block Rate+/Atk Down === Hero-Exclusive Arts === * [[Proud Edge]], AOE / Awakened Boost * [[Celestial Strike]], Knockback/Awakened+ * [[Victory Shift]], Block Rate+/Atk Down == Class Skills == * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 6.png]] '''Mind for Guarding''': Increase damage reduction rate when blocking by 10-20 percentage points. (Rank 15 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 12.png]] '''I'll Help''': Take attacks for nearby allies with low HP. Damage taken is reduced by 15-20%. * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 32.png]] '''Soldier's Potential''': When HP is at 30% or lower, restore 0.6-1.4% HP each second. * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 17.png]] '''Protector's Pride''': Boost recharge speed by 30-50% when non-Defenders are targeted. (Rank 5 Master Skill) === Stat Increases === {| class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%;" !Class Rank !I'll Help !Soldier's Potential !Protector's Pride !Mind for Guarding |- | 1 | 15% | 0.6% | 30% | 10 |- | 5 | 16% | 0.8% | 35% | 12 |- | 10 | 17% | 1% | 40% | 15 |- | 15 | 18% | 1.2% | 45% | 17 |- | 20 | 20% | 1.4% | 50% | 20 |} == Gallery == XC3 Zeon Artwork.png|Zeon, a Guardian Commander XC3 Noah as Guardian Commander.jpg|Noah as a Guardian Commander Guardian Commander Noah.png|Noah as a Guardian Commander Guardian Commander Mio.png|Mio as a Guardian Commander Guardian Commander Eunie.png|Eunie as a Guardian Commander Guardian Commander Taion.png|Taion as a Guardian Commander Guardian Commander Lanz.png|Lanz as a Guardian Commander Guardian Commander Sena.png|Sena as a Guardian Commander == References == {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Classes]]

'''Gust Bracelets''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

'''Gyaarks''' are a family of shark-like aquatic enemies in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}.
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Karifo Gyaark]] * [[Pashfe Gyaark]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Delit Gyaark]] (During ''[[Doing It My Way]]'')
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Intrusive Neville]] * [[Sharkblade Nedd]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Pashfe Gyaark]]
== Gallery == <gallery> Sharkblade Nedd.jpg|Sharkblade Nedd XC3 Intrusive Neville.png|Intrusive Neville </gallery>
{{clr}}
{{xc3 stub}}
[[Category:XC3 Species]] [[Category:XC3 Gyaarks]] [[Category:XC3 Aquatic Life]] [[Category:XC3FR Species]] [[Category:XC3FR Gyaarks]] [[Category:XC3FR Aquatic Life]] [[Category:Gyaarks]] [[Category:Species by Type]]

{{for|other Ether Cylinder varieties|Ether Cylinder}} {{Infobox item |name = HD Ether Cylinders+ |image = |caption = HD Ether Cylinders+ |type = |rarity = |source = |sell = 1000 [[Gold|G]] (Must be sold to [[Totoma]]) }} '''Handy-Dandy Ether Cylinders+''', or '''HD Ether Cylinders+''' for short, are special items in {{XC3}}.
== Overview == HD Ether Cylinders+ are used to upgrade [[Ino]]'s Battle abilities with [[Inoswap]]. Unlike normal [[Ether Cylinder (XC3)|Ether Cylinders]], they can only be filled at designated [[Ether Sphere (mechanic)|Ether Spheres]], which are typically guarded by monsters. After Ino is 100% upgraded with Inoswap, HD Ether Cylinders+ can be sold to [[Totoma]]. They can be sold one at a time, and in groups of 5, 10, and 50 HD Ether Cylinders+, with each cylinder being worth 1000 [[Gold|G]].
== Upgrading == After completing the [[Quest (XC3)|quest]] ''[[Going Full HD]]'', speaking to Totoma will allow the party to upgrade their HD Ether Cylinders+. Upgrading requires giving select items in order to raise completion to 100%. Higher grade cylinders can collect more High Ether from Ether Spheres.

{{spoiler}} {{Infobox Character |name = Hackt |image = XC3 Hackt Icon.png |species = [[Agnus|Agnian]] human |gender = Male |age = 9th Term |haircolor = Brown |eyecolor = Brown |affiliation = [[Colony Gamma]] (formerly)
[[Colony Omega]] (formerly)
[[Lost Numbers]] |voiceactorjp = |voiceactoreng= |appearances = {{XC3}} }} '''Hackt''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|ハクト}}, ''Hakuto'') is a character in {{XC3}}. == Overview == Hackt is an [[Agnus]] soldier from [[Colony Gamma]], and an acquaintance of [[Mio]], [[Sena]] and [[Taion]]. He is killed by the [[Mysterious Enemy]] in Chapter 1, but brought back to life by [[Y]] in Chapter 6. Following his release from Y's control, he moves to the [[City]] and becomes good friends with [[Mwamba]]. {{clr}} == Battle == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Hackt |image = Hackt.jpg |caption = Hackt |category = [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |type = [[Agnus Forces]] |level = 53 |area = [[Captocorn Peak]] ([[Colony Omega]]) |spawntime = During ''[[Side Story: Mio]]'' |respawn = No |movement = |exp = |cp = |sp = |gold = |hp = |strength = |ether = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = |ethdef = |critrate = |guardrate = }} '''Hackt''' is a [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]]. He is an [[Agnus Forces|Agnus Soldier]] who is fought at level 53 in [[Colony Omega]] on [[Captocorn Peak]] during ''[[Side Story: Mio]]''. {{clr}} == Gallery == Hackt2.jpg|Hackt with Weapon Hackt3.jpg|Mysterious Enemy holding Hackt {{XC3CharNav}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Supporting Characters]] [[Category:XC3 Agnians]] [[Category:Lost Numbers]] [[Category:City NPCs]] [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Agnus Forces]] [[Category:XC3 Level 51-55 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:Pages needing plot info]]
